lead_paragraph: WILLIAM L. CHALIN has been lecturing at Randolph, in this State. The Cattarangus Sachem has the following notice of his sayings: "WILLIAM L. CHAPLIN and J. C. HATHAWAY, a couple of the ultra abolition notables, talked to the inhabitants of this village on Tuesday evening last.
